text: Want the Best of Dubai; Contact Arabia Horizons for Affordable Tour Packages , 26 October 2015 -- Beside this they have their own accommodation facility which includes 2 dessert campsites which can accommodate 2300 people.What make a holiday great are fun-filled activities that include shopping, dining, city tours and some adventure activities. All these things when combined together make a holiday memorable and great. Nowadays tourists like to visit to places which are affordable and are easier to reach. And Dubai is one such city which properly fits in this criterion. Today Dubai has become one of the most visited tourist destination across the globe. And what makes this place famous is vast availability of modern facilities like huge shopping malls, racing tracks, adventure sports, five star hotels & restaurants. Seeing a huge response from tourists Dubai government has also made their visa policies more flexible. And after the construction of Burj Khalifa, Ferrari World, Palm Island and several other infrastructures, have made Dubai one of the major tourist hot spot. Apart from entertainment services, the city of Dubai is also very famous for its hotels. Here you will find some of the most luxuries hotels that are known for providing the best hospitality services to their clients. All this development has made Dubai the modern metropolis of the world. Well when it comes to planning or going on a holiday the first thing that needs to be planned is the budget of the trip which usually includes; flights, stay, food, entertainment services, shopping etc. And this budget decides whether you want to have an affordable trip or the luxurious one. Dubai is one such place where you will not only enjoy the modern services but you will also experience the warm and rich emirate culture that will surely make your trip more memorable. If you have a limited budget from your Dubai trip then you must contact Arabia Horizons Tours which is one of the leading tour operators in Dubai, known for providing budget friendly tour packages.
